title: When was the best time to be born as a Human Being on earth? - Quora

response.answer_text: NOW.  There is peace all around (mostly)There is sufficient food for most people... much more than in olden days.There is sufficient and good quality drinking water for most people.There is technology that ancients would have only dreamt of and imagined in their stories.There is an increased lifespan for everyone. And... the best part. You are still alive :P

I think that depends on what you chose to be born as! For instance, if you were born with dark skin, it wouldn’t do to be born in The 18th century in the Americas. Actually, you probably wouldn’t choose ANY time period in the Americas, except the (hopefully soon) future! On the other hand, if you were able to be born White, you couldn’t really beat being born into the post WW2 baby-boomer generation in the U.S. or Europe. Especially in the U.S., no generation before or since ever enjoyed the prosperity, comfort, education and opportunity of that privileged generation of White kids.

The third quarter of the twentieth century, so you become recognised as an adult at about the start of the twenty-first century. I, personally, was born about fifty years too early to take full advantage of this opportunity, but now - at 84 - I’m still reaping the benefits of having been born almost at the best time.

in the UK it was in 1957. Rationing after world war 2 had finished in 1955, the health service was getting good, education was free. And now, those people born in 1957 will get their pensions on time, their house values are at their best, and we have had no war for all that time, I was born in 1960, so that is not too bad either.
